dinosaurs.name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
dinosaurs.description: One of the most famous carnivorous dinosaurs, known for its massive size and fearsome teeth.

dinosaurs.name: Triceratops
dinosaurs.description: A herbivorous dinosaur characterized by its three distinct facial horns and large bony frill.

dinosaurs.name: Velociraptor
dinosaurs.description: A small, agile predator known for its speed and intelligence, with a sickle-shaped claw on each foot.

dinosaurs.name: Brachiosaurus
dinosaurs.description: A massive long-necked herbivore known for its large body and long front legs, which gave it a giraffe-like stance.

dinosaurs.name: Stegosaurus
dinosaurs.description: Recognizable for its row of large, bony plates along its back and its spiked tail used for defense.
